item.title: How I made a Chat Bot ?
item.description: There are a lot of platforms to develop a Chatbot in the market today, some where you do not even need to write a single line of code.

item.title: Breaking XOR Cipher
item.description: XOR is one of the most interesting logical operation but it is definitive not made for encrypting.
